result.longName: Grupa Azoty Zaklady Chemiczne Police S.A.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Grupa Azoty Zaklady Chemiczne Police S.A. manufactures and sells mineral fertilizers in Poland, Germany, South America, rest of Europe, and internationally. It provides compound fertilizers, such as nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium fertilizers under the POLIFOSKA and POLIDAP brand; nitrogen-based chemicals, including ammonia and urea solutions for use in automotive industry to reduce nitrogen oxides in diesel engines; and phosphoric and sulfuric acids. The company also offers pigments comprising titanium dioxide pigments; titanium white products under the TYTANPOL name, which are used in the production of paints and varnishes, printing inks, plastics, papers, and laminates; iron sulphate for cement industry. In addition, it provides defluorinated phosphoric acid, iron sulphate heptahydrate, oleum, and technical sulphuric acid; organic chemicals comprising uncoated urea; LIKAM, a water solution of ammonia; produces and sells electricity, steam heat, heating water, and fly ash; and shipping and transport, packaging, and distribution services, as well as engages in the operation and servicing of ports. Further, the company offers technical infrastructure management services; produces and distributes cooling and demineralized water; wastewater treatment and waste storage solutions; and sea port operation, port construction, property management, research works, sea and inland shipping, and coastal water transportation services. Additionally, it provides renovation and investment works in the mechanical and construction industry; investment, and engineering and technical works in the field of automation and power engineering; and repairs of control and measuring equipment, as well as power engineering machines and devices; and maintenance of computer control systems and process visualization. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Police, Poland. Grupa Azoty Zaklady Chemiczne Police S.A. is a subsidiary of Grupa Azoty S.A.
